ygData.subject: Re: Level 30,35,40,45, and a "power level" comme
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ah, I forgot your level.  Yes, area effect songs are a problem in the newbie zones (see my other message about being careful using Lullaby to help
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 15 Jul 1999 RON_TALBOT@... wrote:
>
> I'm not arguing it's effectiveness. That I concede willingly. It's
> the "careful' part I take exception to. I'm in the middle of a wide
> open area, run up to a mob, attack, spin in place looking for npc's,
> (take damage), see none, start weaving said songs, three rounds latter
> WHAM, a NPC materializes from nowhere and kills me in three mighty
> whacks. I have no intention of spinning in place every round looking

Ah, I forgot your level. Yes, area effect songs are a problem
in the "newbie" zones (see my other message about being
careful using Lullaby to help newbies). Once you get into
your 20s, you can pretty much hold your own in zones where
there are no insta-kill guards or merchants, and few or no
wandering insta-kill mobs.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
